channel.title: DeepLearning on naomori's Diary
channel.description: Recent content in DeepLearning on naomori's Diary

item.title: 2019-07-09: A new task
item.description: It held a first meeting of my new task, deep learning for Embedded device. As a first milestone, I’m going to build a deep learning development environment on NVIDIA’s Jetson TX2 development kit. And I’m going to participate in Deep Learning training. It’s interesting to try new technique. But it’s not easy to learn new technique. I’ll do my best.
